mdRecord.dcterms:title: Brattle Square Church, exterior
First Baptist Church (Boston, Massachusetts)
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Richardson, Henry Hobson (American architect, 1838-1886) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Detail of column capital at entrance

Featuring ivy-covered walls and a prominent tower with distinctive carvings by Frederic Auguste Bartholdi (sculptor of the Statue of Liberty) representing four sacraments, with faces of famous Bostonians(including Longfellow and Hawthorne), Abraham Lincoln, and Bartholdi's friends of that era.(including 'Garabaldi'). -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brattle_Square_Church [work]
